TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit BuildManager extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供一组有助于管理 ASP.NET 应用程序编译的方法。

span.span: Provides a set of methods to help manage the compilation of an ASP.NET application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类管理应用程序的程序集和页面的编译过程。The class manages the process of compiling assemblies and pages for an application. 它是一个密封类，不能被继承。It is a sealed class and cannot be inherited. 包含提供有关编译的程序集的信息的静态成员。 contains static members that provide information about the compiled assemblies.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void AddCompilationDependency (string dependency);
.method public static hidebysig void AddCompilationDependency(string dependency) cil managed
Public Shared Sub AddCompilationDependency (dependency As String)
public: static void AddCompilationDependency(System::String ^ dependency);
static member AddCompilationDependency : string -> unit

param.name: dependency
param.span: 一个表示依赖项的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents a dependency.

summary.span: 指定表示生成管理器使用的依赖项帮助确定是否需要干净生成的字符串。

span.span: Specifies a string that represents a dependency that the build manager uses to help determine if a clean build is required.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在应用程序的阶段，必须调用方法 `Application_PreStartInit` 。The method must be called during the `Application_PreStartInit` stage of the application.

exception.span: 参数为 或空字符串。

span.span: The parameter is or an empty string.

exception.span: 在此应用程序的 阶段后调用该方法。

span.span: The method was called after the stage of the application.

.method public static hidebysig void AddReferencedAssembly(class System.Reflection.Assembly assembly) cil managed

static member AddReferencedAssembly : System.Reflection.Assembly -> unit

param.name: assembly
param.span: 要添加的程序集。

span.span: The assembly to add.

summary.span: 将一个程序集添加到应用程序所引用的一组程序集中。

span.span: Adds an assembly to the application's set of referenced assemblies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法等效于将程序集添加到应用程序级 Web.config 文件中。Calling this method is equivalent to adding the assembly to the application-level Web.config file. 在应用程序的阶段，必须调用方法 `Application_PreStartInit` 。The method must be called during the `Application_PreStartInit` stage of the application. 方法将返回从配置文件和通过使用此方法添加的任何程序集确定的程序集集。The method will return the set of assemblies that are determined from configuration files and any assemblies that were added by using this method. 如果尝试添加已添加的程序集，则会忽略重复项。If an attempt is made to add an assembly that has already been added, the duplicate entry is ignored. `Application_Start`在 global.asax 文件中发生事件之前，必须调用此方法。This method must be called before the `Application_Start` event in the Global.asax file occurs.

span.span: The parameter is or empty.

exception.span: 此方法不在 Global.asax 文件中的 事件发生前调用。

span.span: The method was not called before the event in the Global.asax file occurred.

summary.span: 获取或设置指示是否启用批处理编译的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether batch compilation is enabled.

value.span: 如果始终启用批处理编译，则为 ；如果从不启用批处理编译，则为 ；如果根据配置文件确定编译设置，则为 。

span.span: if batch compilation is always enabled, if batch compilation is never enabled, or if the compilation setting is determined from the configuration file.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性使您能够以编程方式打开或关闭批处理编译。This property enables you to turn batch compilation on or off programmatically. 它对应于 `batch` `compilation` Web.config 文件中元素的属性。It corresponds to the `batch` attribute of the `compilation` element in the Web.config file. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [编译元素 (ASP.NET Settings Schema) ](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/s10awwz0(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [compilation Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/s10awwz0(v=vs.100)). 只能在方法中设置此属性 `PreApplicationStart` 。The property can be set only in the `PreApplicationStart` method. 有关 `PreApplicationStart` 方法的更多信息，请参见 。For more information about the `PreApplicationStart` method, see .

exception.span: 该属性不用 方法设置。

span.span: The property was not set in the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 利用此方法和 方法，你可以执行在部分信任环境中跨应用程序域重新启动的缓存。This method and the method enable you to perform caching that persists across application domain restarts in partial-trust environments. MVC 框架使用它来缓存控制器查找的结果。It is used by the MVC framework to cache results of the controller lookup. 若要缓存数据，你需要写入 由此方法返回的对象。To cache data, you write to the object that is returned by this method.

param.name: context
param.span: 请求的上下文。

span.span: The context of the request.

param.name: virtualPath
param.span: 确定生成依赖项集的虚拟路径。

span.span: The virtual path from which to determine the build dependency set.

param.name: ensureIsUpToDate
param.span: 如果为 ，则指定只应返回最新的生成依赖项集，或者，如果为 ，则指示应返回任何可用的生成依赖项集（即使不是最新）。

span.span: to specify that only a current build dependency set should be returned, or to indicate that any available build dependency set should be returned, even if it is not current.

param.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

summary.span: 如果虚拟路径位于 ASP.NET 缓存中，则为虚拟路径返回生成依赖项集，即使内容不是最新也是如此。

span.span: Returns a build dependency set for a virtual path if the path is located in the ASP.NET cache, even if the content is not current.

returns.span: 存储在缓存中的 对象，或者，如果无法从缓存中检索 对象，则为 。

span.span: A object that is stored in the cache, or if the object cannot be retrieved from the cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `ensureIsUpToDate` 将参数值设置为 `true` ，则 方法重载的行为与 方法重载类似。If the `ensureIsUpToDate` parameter value is set to `true`, the method overload behaves like the method overload. 两个重载返回一个当前生成依赖项集（如果存在），否则返回 `null` 。Both overloads return a current build dependency set if one exists, otherwise they return `null`. 但是， 方法重载包含用于返回任何可用的生成依赖项集（甚至是过期的）的选项。However, the method overload includes the option to return any build dependency set that is available, even an outdated one. 如果将 `ensureIsUpToDate` 参数值设置为 `false` ，则该方法将返回任何可用的生成依赖项集。If the `ensureIsUpToDate` parameter value is set to `false`, the method will return any available build dependency set.

summary.span: 返回所有页编译都必须引用的程序集引用的列表。

span.span: Returns a list of assembly references that all page compilations must reference.

returns.span: 程序集引用的 集合。

span.span: An collection of assembly references.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从方法返回的程序集的集合 包括在 Web.config 文件的 [程序集](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/bfyb45k1(v=vs.100)) 元素中指定的程序集、从 App_Code 目录中的自定义代码生成的程序集和其他顶级文件夹中的程序集。The collection of assemblies that is returned from the method includes assemblies specified in the [assemblies](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/bfyb45k1(v=vs.100)) element of the Web.config file, assemblies built from custom code in the App_Code directory, and assemblies in other top-level folders. .NET Framework 版本3.5 中引入。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见 [.NET Framework 版本和依赖关系](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies)。For more information, see [.NET Framework Versions and Dependencies](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies).

summary.span: 在顶级程序集或配置中定义的程序集内查找类型。

span.span: Finds a type in the top-level assemblies or in assemblies that are defined in configuration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 顶级程序集指的是 global.asax 文件，或者是位于 App_GlobalResources、App_WebReferences、App_Code 或 App_Browsers 目录下的文件。A top-level assembly refers to the Global.asax file, or to a file that is in the App_GlobalResources, App_WebReferences, App_Code, or App_Browsers directory.

public: static System::IO::Stream ^ ReadCachedFile(System::String ^ fileName);
static member ReadCachedFile : string -> System.IO.Stream

param.name: fileName
param.span: 要读取的文件的名称。

span.span: The name of the file to read.

summary.span: 读取一个缓存文件。

span.span: Reads a cached file.

returns.span: 文件的 对象；如果文件不存在，则为 。

span.span: The object for the file, or if the file does not exist.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 利用此方法和 方法，你可以执行在部分信任环境中跨应用程序域重新启动的缓存。This method and the method enable you to perform caching that persists across application domain restarts in partial-trust environments. MVC 框架使用它来缓存控制器查找的结果。It is used by the MVC framework to cache results of the controller lookup. 若要检索缓存的数据，请从 该方法返回的对象读取。To retrieve cached data, you read from the object that is returned by this method.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Runtime.Versioning.FrameworkName TargetFramework { get; }
.property class System.Runtime.Versioning.FrameworkName TargetFramework
Public Shared ReadOnly Property TargetFramework As FrameworkName
public: static property System::Runtime::Versioning::FrameworkName ^ TargetFramework { System::Runtime::Versioning::FrameworkName ^ get(); };
member this.TargetFramework : System.Runtime.Versioning.FrameworkName

summary.span: 获取当前网站的 .NET Framework 的目标版本。

span.span: Gets the target version of the .NET Framework for the current Web site.

value.span: 当前网站的 .NET Framework 的目标版本。

span.span: The target version of the .NET Framework for the current Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性支持 ASP.NET 多目标功能，该功能使你能够使用最新版本的 Visual Studio 来开发将使用早期版本的 .NET Framework 运行的应用程序。This property supports the ASP.NET multi-targeting feature, which enables you to use the latest version of Visual Studio to develop applications that will run with earlier versions of the .NET Framework. 生成提供程序可以使用此属性来确保提供程序生成适用于 .NET Framework 目标版本的代码。A build provider can use this property to make sure that the provider generates code that is appropriate for the targeted version of the .NET Framework. 例如，你可能希望生成不同的代码，具体取决于网站是以 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] 还是为目标 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] 。For example, you might want to generate different code depending on whether a Web site targets the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] or the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 有关多目标的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 项目 .NET Framework 多目标](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb398791(v=vs.100))。For more information about multi-targeting, see [.NET Framework Multi-Targeting for ASP.NET Web Projects](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb398791(v=vs.100)). 如果网站没有 Web.config 文件，ASP.NET 将假定目标 framework 版本是与运行网站的 IIS 应用程序池相关联的版本。If the Web site does not have a Web.config file, ASP.NET assumes that the target framework version is the version that is associated with the IIS application pool that the site is running under. 对于在 Visual Studio 中运行的文件系统网站，默认的框架版本是 .NET Framework 的当前版本。For a file-system Web site that is running in Visual Studio, the default framework version is the current version of the .NET Framework. 如果网站确实有 Web.config 文件，ASP.NET 将通过检查 Web.config 文件确定目标框架。If the Web site does have a Web.config file, ASP.NET determines the target framework by examining the Web.config file. ## 面向 .NET Framework 2.0 的网站Web Sites that Target the .NET Framework 2.0 以为目标的 Web 应用程序 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] 将被编译为 [!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)] 。Web applications that target the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] are compiled as if the target were the [!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)]. 生成过程不区分 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] 和， [!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)] 因为当目标为某个版本时，Web.config 文件不指示编译器版本或目标框架。The build process does not differentiate between the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] and the [!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)] because the Web.config file does not indicate compiler version or target framework when one of those versions is targeted. ([!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] ，Web.config 文件指定编译器版本，而对于 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] ，Web.config 文件指定目标框架。 ) 因此，对于面向的 Web 应用程序， [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] 此属性返回指示的目标框架名字对象 [!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)] 。(For the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)], the Web.config file specifies the compiler version, and for the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], the Web.config file specifies the target framework.) Therefore, for Web applications that target the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], this property returns a target framework moniker that indicates the [!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)]. 这通常不会导致任何问题。This normally will not cause any problems. Visual Studio 会阻止你创建对 [!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)] 项目中面向的功能的引用 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] 。Visual Studio prevents you from creating references to [!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)] features in a project that is targeted for the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]. 例如，Visual Studio 不会为针对的项目中的 WCF 服务提供项模板 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] ，因为 wcf 是使用引入的 [!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)] 并且与不兼容 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] 。For example, Visual Studio does not provide item templates for WCF services in a project that is targeted for [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], because WCF was introduced with the [!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)] and is not compatible with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]. 如果计划在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] 运行时环境中部署网站，并使用 Visual Studio 之外的工具来引用仅与兼容的功能 [!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)] ，则项目可能会生成，而不会生成错误或警告。If you plan to deploy a Web site in a [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] run-time environment and you use a tool other than Visual Studio to reference features that are compatible only with [!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)], the project might build without generating errors or warnings. 但是，当网站在上运行时，应用程序可能会生成错误 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] 。However, the application might generate errors when the Web site runs on the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)].
